attributes.action: Deport all foreign criminals with effect immediately.
attributes.additional_details: We do not want to pay the costs of imprisoning foreign criminals and we do not want to have them continue to commit crime.
attributes.background: All foreign born criminals serving sentences in our prisons, or released back onto our streets, to be deported back to their own countries.
